bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of lumber pain caused by a fetal injury. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 2: 治 妊娠腰痛及妊娠熱病 , “To cure lower back pain during pregnancy and heat disease during pregnancy”. Rou ci 肉刺 , flesh thorn; corn [11]

Alternative Names ji yan 雞眼 , chicken eye, corn; rou ci 肉栨 , flesh spade, corn. Pathological Condition of skin sections developing into thick, unyielding nodes that reach deep into the flesh and are painful to the touch. Often they grow on the feet because a shoe is too tight or has an inner uneven part rubbing the feet. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 脚趾間生 肉如刺，謂之肉刺 , “When flesh resembling a thorn grows on the toes, this is called ‘ flesh thorn ’”.
